HERO.TITLE: Tests, Quizzes...
HERO.SUBTITLE: Take IQ tests, personality quizzes, and more to test yourself and have fun!
HERO.PARAGRAPH: Ever wondered how sharp your mind is, or what your personality says about you? Explore our quizzes and uncover insights while having a great time.

TEST_LIST.BOX_ONE_TEXT: Explore a variety of quizzes designed to challenge, entertain, and inspire.
TEST_LIST.BOX_TWO_TEXT: Share your results, challenge friends, and watch your progress over time.
TEST_LIST.BOX_THREE_TEXT: Discover fun facts and insights about your personality and skills.
